title: Fonda
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mexican street food chain restaurant. Has selection of vegan items, including tortilla crisps with guacamole and pico de gallo, Mex bim bap, and open burrito with black bean falafel. Note the burritos contains dairy so order gluten-free tortilla instead (served as open burrito). Other vegetarian items can be made vegan by omitting ingredients, such as the mushroom taco (omit aioli), mushroom quesadilla in gluten-free base (omit cheese), and chips (omit chipotle aioli).
